lead_paragraph: Rick Nash, Sergei Fedorov and Jason Chimera each had a goal and an assist, and the host Columbus Blue Jackets beat the Chicago Blackhawks, 4-2, to snap a four-game skid. Dan Fritsche also scored for Columbus.
